mapper.update: UPDATE roll_message SET STATUS=1 WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT u.username as createUser, rm.id, rm.content, rm.uid, rm.type, rm.compid, rm.begin_time, rm.end_time, rm.create_time, rm.update_time FROM roll_message rm LEFT JOIN USER u ON rm.uid=u.uid WHERE begin_time < #{currentTime} AND end_time > #{currentTime} AND (type=0 or compid=#{compid}) AND rm.status = 0
